casebody.data:
Helen D. Adams, Respondent, v. The Irving National Bank, Appellant. Decided December 30, 1886. Appeal from judgment in favor of plaintiff entered upon the verdict of a jury, and from order denying defendant’s motion for a new trial upon the minutes. Lindsay & Flammer, attorneys, and Gratz Nathan, of counsel for appellant. Wm. F. Scott, of counsel for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Opinion Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
